name: test_e2e_with_logs[440_XXE_NETDOC_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_NETDOC_001` |
| **Name** | XXE netdoc protocol file access |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | protocol_abuse |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "netdoc:///etc/passwd">`
- **Encoded**: `%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22netdoc%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Latency**: ~41000ms
